The paragraph is describing an observation made in rats after they were administered isoproterenol. The observation was an increase in the level of lipid peroxides in the serum and heart. Lipid peroxides are not considered a disease, but rather a marker of oxidative stress. Therefore, no disease entities were identified in the paragraph.
